column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I love this pizza! Â I know my selection is not the traditional deep dish
column2: but we ordered a thin crust with chicken sausage

column5: so usage of a get in line app would be helpful to keeping people from standing in the cold. I wonder if they could make me one to bring home?
